name: Blaire's Adventures: Investigating The Haunted
description:
Welcome to my very first game, 'Blaire's Adventures'! This is the first chapter, soon I'll try to release the 2nd chapter, until then, have fun!

You, AKA Blaire, is a journalist, who loves to investigate fun places in her freetime! Well... not on this day. She decided to see what's this "haunted castle" thing, that everyone is trying to see, but can't, since the government have this place way more secured than anything else. Somehow, you got in. This is where our story begins...

Press F4 to go in Fullscreen, and press ALT+F4 to quit the game.
